summary.span: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way of generating streams or files containing XML data that conforms to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 and the Namespaces in XML recommendations.

span.span: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way of generating streams or files containing XML data that conforms to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 and the Namespaces in XML recommendations.

XML 規格定義的 surrogate 字組的有效範圍。The XML specification defines the valid ranges for surrogate pairs. 如果寫入，會導致緩衝區中被分割的 surrogate 字組字元 surrogate 字組字元，則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if surrogate pair characters are written that would result in the surrogate pair characters being split in the buffer. ## Examples [!code-csharp[XmlTextWriter.WriteChars#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmltextwriter.writechars/cs/xmlwriterwritecharsexample.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立所使用的執行個體方法和類別，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 這個方法一律會寫入完整的結束標記。This method always writes the full end tag. 處理項目，其中必須包含完整的結束標記時，這非常有用。This is useful when dealing with elements that must include a full end tag. 例如，瀏覽器預期 HTML 指令碼區塊，以 「 \< /指令碼 > 」。For example, browsers expect HTML script blocks to be closed with "\". ## Examples 下列範例會寫出具有沒有內容的項目。The following example writes out an element with no content. 它會使用 WriteFullEndElement 寫入完整的結尾項目標記。It uses WriteFullEndElement to write the full end element tag. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteStartDocument() cil managed

summary.span: Writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0".

span.span: Writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0".

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立所使用的執行個體方法和類別，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 寫入器實作的方式取決於文件的編碼方式的層級。The encoding level of the document is determined by how the writer is implemented. 例如，如果中指定物件`XmlTextWriter`建構函式，這會決定編碼屬性的值。For example, if an object is specified in the `XmlTextWriter` constructor, this determines the value of the encoding attribute. 這個方法不會建立獨立屬性。This method does not create a standalone attribute. 當`WriteStartDocument`呼叫寫入器會驗證您要撰寫是否格式正確的 XML 文件。When `WriteStartDocument` is called the writer validates that what you are writing is a well-formed XML document. 例如，它會檢查 XML 宣告，第一個節點，其中只有一個根層級項目存在，依此類推。For example, it checks that the XML declaration is the first node, that one and only one root-level element exists and so on. 如果未呼叫此方法，則寫入器會假設正在寫入的 XML 片段，並不套用任何根層級的規則。If this method is not called, the writer assumes an XML fragment is being written and applies no root level rules. 如果`WriteStartDocument`已經呼叫，然後方法可用來建立另一個 XML 宣告，會擲回例外狀況。If `WriteStartDocument` has been called and then the method is used to create another XML declaration, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 檔案代表活頁簿。The following example writes an XML file representing a book. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: This is not the first write method called after the constructor.

span.span: This is not the first write method called after the constructor.

summary.span: Writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0" and the standalone attribute.

span.span: Writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0" and the standalone attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立所使用的執行個體方法和類別，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 寫入器實作的方式取決於文件的編碼方式的層級。The encoding level of the document is determined by how the writer is implemented. 例如，如果中指定物件`XmlTextWriter`建構函式，這會決定編碼屬性的值。For example, if an object is specified in the `XmlTextWriter` constructor, this determines the value of the encoding attribute. 當`WriteStartDocument`呼叫寫入器會驗證您要撰寫是否格式正確的 XML 文件。When `WriteStartDocument` is called the writer validates that what you are writing is a well-formed XML document. 例如，它會檢查 XML 宣告，第一個節點，其中只有一個根層級項目存在，依此類推。For example, it checks that the XML declaration is the first node, that one and only one root-level element exists and so on. 如果未呼叫此方法，則寫入器會假設正在寫入的 XML 片段，並不套用任何根層級的規則。If this method is not called, the writer assumes an XML fragment is being written and applies no root level rules. 如果`WriteStartDocument`已經呼叫，然後方法可用來建立另一個 XML 宣告，會擲回例外狀況。If `WriteStartDocument` has been called and then the method is used to create another XML declaration, an exception is thrown.

exception.span: This is not the first write method called after the constructor.

span.span: This is not the first write method called after the constructor.

param.span: Text to write.

summary.span: Writes the given text content.

span.span: Writes the given text content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立所使用的執行個體方法和類別，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. `WriteString` 會執行下列作業`WriteString` does the following - 字元`&`， `<`，和`>`會取代`&`， `<`，和`>`分別。The characters `&`, `<`, and `>` are replaced with `&`, `<`, and `>`, respectively. - 範圍 0 x-0x1F （不含空白字元 0x9、 0xA 和為 0xD） 中的字元值會取代數字字元實體 (`�`透過`�x1F`)。Character values in the range 0x-0x1F (excluding white space characters 0x9, 0xA, and 0xD) are replaced with numeric character entities (`�` through `�x1F`). - 如果`WriteString`呼叫在屬性值的內容中，以取代 double 和單一引號`"`和`'`分別。If `WriteString` is called in the context of an attribute value, double and single quotes are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively. 這在輸入字串，例如`testtest`撰寫為For example, this input string `testtest` is written as ``` test<item>test ``` 如果`text`是`null`或`String.Empty`，這個方法會寫入任何資料內容與文字節點。If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a text node with no data content. ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 片段。The following example writes an XML fragment. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Generates and writes the surrogate character entity for the surrogate character pair.

span.span: Generates and writes the surrogate character entity for the surrogate character pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立所使用的執行個體方法和類別，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 這個方法僅適用於使用 utf-16 編碼的系統上。This method is only applicable on systems that use UTF-16 encoding. 以十六進位格式寫入 surrogate 字元實體。The surrogate character entity is written in hexadecimal format. Surrogate 字元的範圍是`#x10000`至`#x10FFFF`。The range for surrogate characters is `#x10000` to `#x10FFFF`. 下列公式用來產生 surrogate 字元實體: (`highChar` - `0xD800`) \* `0x400` + (`lowChar` - `0xDC00`) + `0x10000`。The following formula is used to generate the surrogate character entity: (`highChar` - `0xD800`) \* `0x400` + (`lowChar` - `0xDC00`) + `0x10000`. HTML 和 XML 文件的字元集 （以及數字字元參考的標記法） 根據 UCS [ISO 10646]。For both HTML and XML, the document character set (and therefore the notation of numeric character references) is based on UCS [ISO-10646]. 來源文件中的單一數字字元參考可能因此在某些情況下對應到兩個 16 位元單位數 （為高 surrogate 和低 surrogate） 的字串。A single numeric character reference in a source document may therefore in some cases correspond to two 16-bit units in a string (a high surrogate and a low surrogate). 這些 16 位元的單位稱為 「 surrogate 字組 」。These 16-bit units are referred to as a surrogate pair. 如需有關 (instance) 或字元的詳細資訊，請參閱的區段 3.7 Unicode standard 3.0/Unicode 2.0 位於http://www.unicode.org，2.2 小節 W3C XML 1.0 版建議事項位於或http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets。For more information regarding surrogates or characters, refer to section 3.7 of the Unicode 3.0/Unicode 2.0 standard located at http://www.unicode.org, or section 2.2 of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets.

exception.span: An invalid surrogate character pair was passed.

span.span: An invalid surrogate character pair was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立所使用的執行個體方法和類別，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 這個屬性可讓您找出另一個元件中的寫入器狀態的一個元件。This property allows one component to find out what state another component has left the writer in. 例如，可能是一個元件要通知另產生哪一個語言的說明文字。For example, perhaps one component wants to tell another which language help text to generate. 語言資訊藉由撰寫溝通`xml:lang`屬性。The language information is communicated by writing an `xml:lang` attribute.
